job_description: • Minimum Qualifications5+ years of professional backend software engineering experience, with demonstrated proficiency in Java, Kotlin, or similar object oriented programming languagesProven ability to design, build, and operate distributed systems at scale in production environmentsProficiency with relational (SQL) and NoSQL databasesClear, thoughtful communication across code reviews, documentation, and cross-functional collaborationBachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent practical experience.
